skilllist.skilldesc:
When Thamuz is holding his <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>, each of his Basic Attacks has a chance to conjure a burst of Lava Energy beneath the target that erupts after a 0.7s delay, dealing 45<font color="ffe63c"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color="ffe63c">(+5*Hero Level)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.
When without <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>, Thamuz gains 25% extra Movement Speed and will enhance his next Basic Attack after retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>. The enhanced Basic Attack slows the target by 30% and is guaranteed to trigger Lava Energy.

Thamuz tosses <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> in the target direction. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 120<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. The <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> will then slow nearby enemies by 30% and deal 45<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> every 0.5s.
After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or a certain distance, the <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> will return to Thamuz and drag enemies in their path to him. Thamuz can approach the Scythes or cast the skill again to retrieve them.

Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 230<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slow the enemy units by 25% for 2s upon landing. 
If the Scythes are still travelling, they will return to Thamuz and <font color="a6aafb">Molten Scythes</font> will reset its CD instantly.

Thamuz spouts the lava stored in his body, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and creating a <font color="a6aafb">Cauterant Zone</font> around him. The <font color="a6aafb">Cauterant Zone</font> lasts 9s and deals 30<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> every 0.5s to enemies in the area.
Meanwhile, Thamuz gains 500 extra Max HP, heals himself by the same amount, and increases his Attack Speed by 1.3 times. He also recovers 1.5% Max HP each time he deals damage with Basic Attacks or his <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>.

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldescemblem: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Attack Speed-focused with Ultimate for big Regen.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Basic Attacks slow enemies by <%Num1> and reduce their Attack Speed by <%Num2>.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s (each Basic Attack reduces it by <Num5>s, down to <Num6>s)[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: TEA
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Thamuz can play to his strength when working with Supports who provide Movement Speed or CC, such as Angela and Rafaela, because they enable him to stay on his targets.

strong.desc: Thamuz is good against other sustained damage Fighters like Zilong and Sun because he has the top notch laning power.

weak.desc: Thamuz is countered by agile Marksmen, such as Karrie and Irithel, since he lacks CC and relies on Basic Attacks, making him an easy target to kite.
